## Description {#details}

Abstract base for classes implementing <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pbqp">PBQP</a> register allocation constraints (e.g.

Spill-costs, interference, coalescing).

Definition at line 37 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/pbqpraconstraint-h">PBQPRAConstraint.h</a>.
